name: Magic Cake - DIY Birthday & Wedding Cakes
name_original: Magic Cake - DIY Birthday & Wedding Cakes
description:
All girls want gorgeous and delicious birthday and wedding cakes. Let's begin to make a cake and decorate it with beautiful and elegant decorations like fruits, tasty candies or yummy vanilla cream .

Tasty Flavors! (Chocolate, Yellow, Apple, Strawberry, Orange, Lemon, Carrot, Blueberry, Cherry, Cheese, Vanilla, Confetti Chip, Pumpkin, Peanut Butter, Red Velvet, Banana, White) Try them all!

Enjoy playing our cooking wedding cake games! Don't forget to take a picture for you and your cake, then you can print and keep it in your photo frame. Or, you can share it with family and friends through Facebook or E-Mail as you prefer, to let others admire your works.
